item.title: Html tags in .md files not working
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Let’s Start ! Step 1. Modify config.toml Step 2. Verify Config Success Refer Docs Introduction Since Hugo version 0.60, the default Markdown renderer has been changed to goldmark. In goldmark, the default is not to render raw HTML tags. So, You may has some promble like this : If you need use html tags, please follow me:
